original_text: Then the second angel poured out his bowl on the sea. As a result, the sea became like the blood of a dead person. Everything that was living in the sea then died.
korean_text: 둘째 천사가 그 대접을 바다에 쏟으매 바다가 곧 죽은 자의 피 같이 되니 바다 가운데 모든 생물이 죽더라

sentences.original_text: Then the second angel poured out his bowl on the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 두 번째 천사가 그 대접을 바다에 쏟아 부었습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, the sea became like the blood of a dead person
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 바다는 죽은 사람의 피처럼 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: Everything that was living in the sea then died
sentences.korean_translation: 바다에 살고 있던 모든 것은 그 후에 죽었습니다
